reviewText: This particular film adaptation of Brian Friel's play just could not, in my opinion, be better. A great play. A great film. Great famous actors. Great setting. Great direction. Just great. Like a symphony, you can watch it and appreciate it again and again and still enjoy it.Brian Friel's Philadelphia, Here I Come!Philadelphia, Here I Come [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 0 Import - Australia ]Philadelphia Here I Come [VHS]
